body.name: Mcpiwohy Ergonomic Mouse, Optical Vertical Mouse Rechargeable USB Mouse 2.4GHz Wireless Mouse with 6 Buttons,3 Adjustable 1200/1600/2400 DPI for Laptop, Desktop, PC, MacBook (Blue)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: ⚡【Wireless Mouse & Ergonomic Design (Right Hand)】 Vertical mouse designed with an ergonomic, natural handshake posture for a more natural, comfortable hand position for smoother movement and less overall stress, reducing muscle strain and wrist stress.（It Is Recommended To Use 5v Voltage Charger Or Computer Usb Port, Do Not Use More Than 5v Fast Charger And Charging Cable！）

⚡【Sensitive Efficient & Vertical Mouse 】3 adjustable DPI (1200/1600/2400) allows you to change the cursor sensitivity easily depending on your activity and track more smoothly over a variety of surfaces, Suitable for office and home use. The ergonomic mouse has 6 function buttons design，Make your use more efficient and convenient！

⚡【Ergonomic Mouse & Wireless Silent】Both left and right buttons are Noiseless click designed to keeps you concentrate on your work and free you worry about bothering others. 2.4G wireless connection reduces all the interference and delays , plug and play！Just plug the USB receiver into pc or laptop and You can use this wireless mouse.

⚡【More Durable & Auto-sleep】Ergonomic wireless mouse has been tested for over 6 million mouse clicks. On a full charge（500mAH Built-in Rechargeable Battery） ,It can be used for over 1 month .vertical mouse will enter sleep mode when you over 10 minutes of no any operation.Click any button to wake it up. After receiving the mouse fully charged before use！

🛒【Wide Compatibilty & Mcpiwohy Service】USB mode supports devices with Windows / Android / Mac OS system. 2.4G mode supports all devices with usb port. Fits PC, laptop, cellphone, Mac. （What You Get：Mouse *1, USB receiver *1, charging cable *1, user manual *1）We provide 12 months of worry free after sales service. If you encounter any problems with the Ergonomic mouse , please feel free to contact us！

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this mouse and amazing customer service!
reviews.reviewText: *update* after I left my review, the seller contacted me and sent me a new mouse. It has worked like a champ so far. I am so happy, because I really do love this mouse. It’s responsive, intuitive, and it feels great (both ergonomically and tactile), plus the buttons are so quiet and smooth when you click.And I seriously can’t say enough nice things about the customer service experience :)I loved this mouse… it was comfortable and quiet and rechargeable. It lasted for about a month of not even daily use. Now it works for about 15 minutes on a full charge before it just stops. No warning or anything. Just quits working because it has no more juice left.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Died after four months
reviews.reviewText: This is my first vertical mouse, and I love it. Color, feel, etc., alleviated my write pain wonderfully. However on 12/20, about four months after I purchased this mouse, it stopped working, with no warning, no notice that it needed to charge, anything. I plugged it in immediately, and despite blinking lights suggesting the charge is working, after charging overnight, there is no sign of life. It appears unable to hold a charge. I will be purchasing a more reliable brand like Logitech after this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is the perfect mouse! GET ONE!
reviews.reviewText: I have been using a traditional mouse for years and always experienced wrist pain and poor blood circulation to my right hand after long hours at the computer. I decided to give this Optical Vertical Mouse a try, and I couldn't be happier with my purchase.First of all, the ergonomic design is a game changer. It took me a couple of days to get used to the vertical orientation, but once I did, my wrist pain was virtually eliminated. The mouse's natural handshake position truly provides comfort during extended use and reduces strain on my wrist.The rechargeable feature is another huge plus. I've been using this mouse for about 2 weeks now and haven't had to recharge it yet. We'll see how much longer it lasts, but 2 weeks is pretty impressive already.The build quality feels solid, and the materials used give it a premium feel. The mouse is also relatively lightweight, which helps reduce fatigue during long sessions.In conclusion, this Optical Vertical Mouse has been a fantastic addition to my work setup. It's comfortable, rechargeable, and performs well across a range of tasks. If you're experiencing wrist pain or simply looking for a more ergonomic mouse, I highly recommend giving this one a try. Your wrist will thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Mouse is good, but USB is too fragile
reviews.reviewText: The mouse was bought for my son’s computer class. When I tried to pull out the USB, the plastic part cracked. I didn’t expect to return it, so the box was lost when I opened it. It’s a pity.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Mouse worked fine but battery died after two months of moderate use.
reviews.reviewText: Got this mouse for the ergonomic design to address carpal tunnel issues for moderate office work. It worked fine for a few months with roughly 20 hours a week of office productivity use. I haven't had to charge it since the initial charge.Suddenly, the other day, it just stopped working. I plugged it in, which began charging the mouse and allowed me to use it as a wired device. After charging for four to five hours, the mouse will still not work without being plugged in. Tried resyncing it and switching power on and off. It appears the battery just died.The only cons other than the battery dying are that it has a proprietary USB A adapter (USB C would have been nice) and the charging port is an older style micro-USB port (again, not USB C).I guess I wasn't expecting much for a $13 mouse, but it clearly wasn't designed to last very long.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I just purchased today Updating one month later
reviews.reviewText: I don't know about the battery life. I just charged it fully today on the usb port.It is so comfortable for my hand and so quiet. With no clicking noise I never realizedhow noisy it used to be.Very pleased with the purchase. Just plug in the usb connector that sits inthe bottom of the mouse and nothing else to do but Turn It On!! so easyUPDATE: after one month usage I needed to charge the battery. Not a problem except it charged for 16 hours and then I needed to charge it again after 4 hours of use.I am beyond the return cutoff. I will keep this handy as a spare until the new Logitech is rec'd

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Stopped working after a few months
reviews.reviewText: Like others, this mouse has a great design, quiet clicks and held a decent charge until it doesn't. Have had for 4 months and it won't charge. I'm using the original charging cord and plugged into the computer as instructed and device appears green as if charged, yet won't work. Most frustrating about this is I'm outside the return window and I can't find a way to get a hold of the manufacture at all. Will pay the extra for a more reputable brand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I just got this mouse and it was working really well and then it came to first charge. I plugged it in for 24 hours just in case then unplugged it and it died immediately. It is now a wired mouse and it won't work without being plugged in. I don't know what happened but I am annoyed. I will use the mouse for now but will look else where for a new one.Edit:Due to the excellent customer service I received and getting a replacement I will be adjusting my review. However, this did not resolve my issue the replacement also did not work whenever you unplugged it. At this point I'm thinking it's my bad luck but I'm not going to penalize the company for it since they were so prompt with assisting me with this problem.As a Wired Mouse it works fine. It's silent and comfortable to hold

This is a great economy ergonomic mouse. Unfortunately, it was poorly packaged and when it arrived, something was rattling around inside the mouse and it wouldn't work. There are three screws under the plastic tabs under the mouse, removed them and discovered the battery had become disconnected. Reconnected the battery and the mouse works fine. I wanted to mention this in case it happens to someone else. Easy fix and saves you the trouble of returning it.
Good quality and feels good when used.
Le curseur "skip' et saute d'une place à l'autre le tiers du temps. Ne se déplace pas en douceur sur l'écran. Par contre la forme a beaucoup aidé mes douleurs au poignet
Love the size and feel but it stopped charging after two months . I don’t recommend it

reviews.reviewTitle: Device no longer holds a charge
reviews.reviewText: Exchange period ended November 19th and now the device no longer works. Not happy
